    • hasAppliedForProject

      public boolean hasAppliedForProject(HDBOfficer officer, Project project)
      Checks if an officer has applied for a project as an applicant
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer to check
      project - The project to check
      Returns:
      true if the officer has applied for the project, false otherwise

    • registerForProject

      public boolean registerForProject(HDBOfficer officer, String projectName)
      Registers an officer to handle a project
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer to register
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      true if registration succeeded, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to search for
      Returns:

      Authenticates an officer using NRIC and password
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to authenticate
      password - The password to authenticate
      Returns:
      The authenticated officer, or null if authentication fails
